section.p:
Add will schedule files and directories to your working copy. They will be uploaded and added to the repository on your next commit.
How to add file:
1. Select and right click the unversioned item(s) you want to add to the working copy.
2.Select Add from the item menu.
3. Commit if you want to add the files to the repository.
Notice that the status symbol has changed in front of the item(s) added in Solution Explorer from
to
Ankhs output window will show all the files that has been added to the working copy.
NOTE: If you add something and change your mind before committing, you can unschedule the addition using the revert command.
